mapper.sql: SELECT T.USER_ID, T.USER_NO, T.USER_CN, T.USER_EN, T.MOBILE, T.MOBILE_VALIDATED, T.EMAIL, T.EMAIL_VALIDATED, T.USER_TYPE, T.USER_STATUS, T.PASSWORD_UPDATE_TIME, T.PASSWORD_ERROR_NUM, T.LOCK_TIME, T.USER_SEX, T.USER_PHOTO, T.ENABLE_FLAG, T.CREATE_BY, T.CREATE_DATE, T.LAST_UPDATE_BY, T.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM SYS_USER_T T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_USER_T ( USER_NO, USER_CN, USER_EN, MOBILE, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_TYPE, USER_SEX, CREATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_BY )VALUES( #{param.userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.userCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.userEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.currentUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{param.currentUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_T T WHERE T.USER_CN=#{userCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_USER_T T SET T.USER_CN=#{param.userCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.USER_EN=#{param.userEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.USER_SEX=#{param.userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.MOBILE=IF(T.MOBILE_VALIDATED='Y',T.MOBILE,#{param.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), T.EMAIL=IF(T.EMAIL_VALIDATED='Y',T.EMAIL,#{param.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), T.LAST_UPDATE_BY=#{param.currentUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, T.LAST_UPDATE_DATE=NOW() WHERE T.USER_ID=#{param.userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

UPDATE SYS_USER_T T SET T.USER_STATUS=#{param.userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.LAST_UPDATE_BY=#{param.currentUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
T.LOCK_TIME=NOW(),
T.LOCK_TIME=NULL,
T.LAST_UPDATE_DATE=NOW() WHERE T.USER_ID=#{param.userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
AND T.USER_STATUS IN('L','D')
AND T.USER_STATUS='Y'
AND T.USER_STATUS IN('L','Y')
mapper.select:
